venue.address_1: intersection of walter and bussey streets
venue.name: arnold arboretum

item.description:
the weather's been rough, but now it's time to get outside and explore----do some tracking, birding, winter plant i.d.----plus lucas morgan will be attending. lucas is a conservation biology researcher who's had extensive experience with the flora of hawaii. he'll answer questions and share his observations (be warned: they're grim).

dress warm, wear boots. bring water, field guides, binocs.

there are more than 6 entrances in addition to the main entrance. we will be meeting at the one located at the intersection of Walter and Bussey streets.
item.how_to_find_us: my vehicle: red jeep with big wheels.
item.name: meet lucas morgan at the arnold arboretum
